pkgmetadata.longdescription: OpenVPN 3 Linux is a next-generation OpenVPN client implementation built on OpenVPN 3 Core library. It provides full configuration and session management with improved security through privilege separation and execution models. Unlike OpenVPN 2.x, it allows unprivileged users to start their own VPN sessions and includes built-in network configuration management with DNS resolver support. The architecture is based on D-Bus services providing robust inter-process communication.
